metadata.name: FTREKT Hat
metadata.description:
Show your loss to the world with the exclusive FTREKT Hat NFT and help a good cause at the same time. 

The hat can be burned to receive a burni FTREKT Hat NFT and the physical hat. 

All proceeds after the hat production costs and shipping costs go to TMTRD (The Man That Rescues Dogs Foundation) and to Backpack Bed for Homeless Australia, equally distributed.

There is a 6.9% royalty for secondary sales of the NFT. All royalties are automatically directed towards TMTRD and to Backpack Bed for Homeless Australia, again, equally distributed.
